forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine early then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High near 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
